summary: Cuirasses and skirts. Few variants. For CBBE. Armor stats like daedric armor.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ffe599][size=6]Description[/size][/color][/b]

Mod was made for CBBE 3.4f, supports weight slider, can be used with UNP and UNPB.
Mod has cuirass and skirt, skirt uses slot for boots. Items are in chest in Riverwood near the river. Armor is temperable. Armor stats like daedric armor.
Cuirass 2 variants * few color versions (copper, gold, obsidian, steel).
Skirt 6 variants * few colors (goldred, goldblue, goldgreen)

F.A.Q:
Q: Will it be UNP version?
A: Not sure. Maybe. However mod works with UNP without problems.

Q: Why 90 Mb size?
A: NormalMaps for cuirass are 2048x2048 uncompressed. So they have 22 Mb size.

Q: Will it be more colors?
A: Not sure, maybe.

Credits
